PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-04562025-03-23FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCanada Development Investment Corporation -- Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation
PrecisOrder directing the Canada Development Investment Corporation (CDEV) to take such steps as are necessary to facilitate Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation's (CEEFC) administration of a new credit support facility for large Canadian companies affected by tariffs, in accordance with any directive that may be given to that subsidiary.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order directing the Canada Development Investment Corporation (CDEV) to take such steps as are necessary to facilitate Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation's (CEEFC) administration of a new credit support facility for large Canadian companies affected by tariffs, in accordance with any directive that may be given to that subsidiary.
